hero.title: Master pronunciation with friendly, real-time coaching
hero.description: We're crafting an upgraded experience powered by Azure Speech so you can record, analyze and understand tips without the technical jargon.

preview.title: Pronunciation insights
preview.tipBody: Practice the long /iː/ vowel with “beach”, “need” and “feel”.
